EmailTemplate.description: IN USE Email Template sent to Panel Head when assigned as panel head
EmailTemplate.name: Panel Assignment: Notification of Panel Assignment
EmailTemplate.subject: {!ReviewPanel__c.ReviewStepName__c}: Panel Assigned
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You have been assigned the following task in the Enterprise Grants Management System (EGMS).
Internal Review Panelist
Funding Opportunity:
RFA #: {!Announcement__c.AnnouncementId__c}
RFA Title: {!Announcement__c.AnnouncementName__c}
Applications that have completed the external review process now require an internal review. You have been selected to complete the internal review of applications added to your PENDING TASKS list. Log-in to EGMS to locate your tasks under the APPLICATIONS TAB.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely,
EGMS Team
